meanings.definition: To treat or infect with bacteria.
meanings.sent1: The doctor will bacterize the wound to prevent infection.
meanings.sent2: She accidentally bacterized the food by leaving it out too long.
meanings.sent3: I hope the bacteria don't throw a party after being bacterized.
meanings.sent4: The bacteria quickly bacterized the entire population, spreading like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The image of bacteria crawling all over the skin after bacterization is quite vivid.

meanings.definition: To cause to become infected with bacteria.
meanings.sent1: The dirty water will bacterize the clean dishes if not washed properly.
meanings.sent2: Leaving food out in the heat can bacterize it quickly.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria decided to bacterize the entire picnic, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: His careless actions bacterized the entire laboratory, leading to contamination.
meanings.sent5: The thought of bacteria sneaking in to bacterize the body is quite alarming.
